name: Psycho Slime
description:
Welcome to PsychoSlime !

Your name is Slime Slayer, you are tasked with purging this island of its infestation.

hundreds of slimes have taken over with the help of an alpha slime, your mission is simple, kill them all or die trying.

How to play:

navigate through each island using the default sword the character has to kill any and all slimes you can find, be careful, they hurt to touch, and they get more powerful the more you progress, they can crawl through fences, because you know, they're made of slime. collect the hearts located around the map to regain your health. red hearts restore 10 health, gold restores all health, use them wisely, health is in short supply nowadays. Kill every slime on the island and make it to the extraction helicopter located at the northern most point behind the alpha slime.

please note: the quit button will not work in the browser version of this game as it is intended to be used in a downloaded application.
